website_summaries.verdict: High shine finish that gives instant plumping followed by ongoing improved lip looks after a few weeks of use.
pros: Collagen-activated to plump and define lips
Can be used as a base or topcoat
Helps set lipstick, or can be used as a base coat, too
cons: Tended to dry out the lips

customer_reviews.title: but good for a different purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have no lips. Well, unlike the other products that I have tried, this gives a permanent boost to the appearance of your lips over time. However, the change so far (1 month) is minimal, but noticeable. If you want something that instantly makes your lips look significantly more luscious, try the one from BFE brand - which is definitely not permanent, but good for a different purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CoolieDude

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT? Has a little tingle but doesn't last ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT? Has a little tingle but doesn't last long. I use it every night when I go to bed and have seen that it is helping to slowly bring the fullness back to the 54 yr old lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lip plumper. It really works. Must reapply often. Best part; it doesn't burn. Worst part; lip seem sad without it.
customer_reviews.author: quiltkitty82

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3 or 4th time I have bought this product. I love it, will continue to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Best lip plumper I've tried so far!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and does make a difference in plumping up the lips. Especially overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Yakopovich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Full Lips
customer_reviews.text: I would totally recommend to any of the older women out there who want to love their lips again.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Imitation Dior
customer_reviews.text: Auhentic Dior has a tingling. This one had no tingling.
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: No change. I applied to clean exfoliated lips. I waited an hour checking every 10 minutes. It did tingle.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Did not get right product.
customer_reviews.text: I got a similar looking lip gloss but it doesn't say anything about collagen on the bottle as it does in the picture. It also has a shimmer in it. Still pretty but not what I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t do anything and comes off with minutes and drys my lips out. Don’t recommend this product at all . Way way to expensive
customer_reviews.author: katrina Pogoda

customer_reviews.title: product was open!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for this lipstick to arrive and it was open.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M Toribio

customer_reviews.title: Love this product - thought this was a set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - thought this was a set of two not a single. Would have been an outstanding price for the two which was why I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hudick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I saw no difference at all. Was diligent on using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this now for about a month and I must admit that my lips are more defined, soft, smooth and maybe even a bit plumper. I'm in my 60's and lips start getting thin. This has helped a lot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sueinblue

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It really does work! Granted, it didn't turn me into Bianca Jagger, but I got noticeable results quickly! It took about 2 weeks of using it every day before I said OMG, it's working! I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Better than City Lips.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent plumper. Expensive but costs the same as City Lips, which I used for years.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader29

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive... absolutely no change in lips! Will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I think I ordered two for $66. But I only received one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Christian Dior Dior Addict Lip Maximizer Collagen Activ High Volume Plumper#4153 IGN
product_meta.description: Christian Dior Dior Addict Lip Maximizer Collagen Activ High Volume Lip Plumper presents a revolutionary lip care system that boosts volume instantly and restructures in the long term, thanks to a unique blend of hyaluronic and marine-based fillers that smooth, moisturize and leave lips irresistibly plump. Its fresh mint-vanilla scent makes it even more addictive.
